item.title: C3 Linearization and Python MRO(Method Resolution Order)
item.description: Python supports multiple inheritance, its class can be derived from more than one base classes. If the specified attribute or methods was not found in current class, how to decide the search sequence from superclasses? In simple scenario, we know left-to right, bottom to up. But when the inheritance hierarchy become complicated, it’s not easy to answer by intuition.
